0.name: Azure Security Center next generation firewall monitoring is set to disabled
0.description: This policy identifies the Azure Security Center policies which have next generation firewall monitoring is set to disabled. Enabling next generation firewall monitoring will extend protection beyond a traditional firewall setting of Network Security Groups in Microsoft Azure environment. A Next-Generation Firewall (NGFW) is a part of the third generation of firewall technology, combining a traditional firewall with other network device filtering functionalities.
0.rule.query: config where cloud.type = 'azure' AND api.name = 'azure-policy-assignments' AND json.rule = '((name == SecurityCenterBuiltIn and properties.parameters.nextGenerationFirewallMonitoringEffect.value equals Disabled) or (name == SecurityCenterBuiltIn and properties.parameters[*] is empty and properties.displayName does not start with "ASC Default"))'
0.recommendation:
1. Login to Azure Portal
2. Go to 'Security Center' (Left Panel)
3. Click on 'Security Policy' under 'POLICY & COMPLIANCE'
4. Choose the reported Subscription
5. On the Security Policy page, under 'Security center default policy' section, Click on 'View effective policy'
6. Click on 'SecurityCenterBuiltIn'
7. Select 'Parameters' tab
8. Set 'Monitor unprotected network endpoints in Azure Security Center' to AuditIfNotExists
9. If no other changes required then Click on 'Review + save'
0.remediation.description: This CLI command requires 'Microsoft.Authorization/policyAssignments/*' permission. Successful execution will set system updates, security configuration, endpoint protection, disk encryption, network security groups, web application firewall, next generation firewall, vulnerability assessment, storage encryption, jit network access, adaptive application controls, sql auditing and sql encryption to 'AuditIfNotExists'.
0.remediation.impact: sets system updates, security configuration, endpoint protection, disk encryption, network security groups, web application firewall, next generation firewall, vulnerability assessment, storage encryption, jit network access, adaptive application controls, sql auditing and sql encryption to 'AuditIfNotExists'
